categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic Special Forces units
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic squads

nodes.text: Recon-A was a Rebel commando squad consisting of ten troopers who were armed with blaster carbines and repeating blasters. Under the command of Bren Harvist, they were assigned to help rebuild an Ewok village after the Battle of Endor. When the village was attacked, Recon-A helped defend it.
